[docs]    def read_online(self, client):
        user_list = []
        clients = HWIOS.ws_realm.pool.get_clients()
        for client in clients: user_list.append(client.profile.username)
        return {'data':{'online':user_list}}
        
            


[docs]    def send_message(self, client, message):
        for aclient in HWIOS.ws_realm.pool.get_clients():
            if aclient != client:             
                aclient.remote('/data/modules/messenger/messages/receive/',{'message':message,'from':client.profile.username})
        return {'data':{'message':message,'from':client.profile.username}}
